api_secret.title: API Secret
api_secret.description: Mixpanel API Secret. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

attribution_window.title: Attribution Window
attribution_window.description: A period of time for attributing results to ads and the lookback period after those actions occur during which ad results are counted.Default attribution window is 5 days.

project_timezone.title: Project Timezone
project_timezone.description: Time zone in which integer date times are stored. The project timezone may be found in the project settings in the Mixpanel console.

select_properties_by_default.title: Select Properties By Default
select_properties_by_default.description: Setting this config parameter to TRUE ensures that new properties on events and engage records are captured. Otherwise new properties will be ignored

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated. If this option is not set, the connector will replicate data from up to one year ago by default.

region.title: Region
region.description: The region of mixpanel domain instance either US or EU.
